resources.title: The Python Bible | Everything You Need to Program in Python
resources.description: Build 11 Projects and go from Beginner to Expert in Python with the World's Most Fun Project-Based Python Course!
learningObjectives: Python variables and data storage
Numeric operations and calculations in Python
String manipulation and text processing
Conditional logic and control flow statements
Python data structures: lists, dictionaries, and tuples
Loops and iteration for automation
Creating reusable functions
Object-oriented programming with classes and objects
Building complete Python projects and scripts
Python fundamentals for data science, web development, and AI

resources.title: Machine Learning by Stanford University
resources.description: This course provides a broad introduction to machine learning, datamining, and statistical pattern recognition.
learningObjectives: Supervised learning (parametric/non-parametric algorithms, support vector machines, kernels, neural networks)
Unsupervised learning (clustering, dimensionality reduction, recommender systems, deep learning)
Best practices in machine learning (bias/variance theory, innovation process in ML and AI)
Apply learning algorithms to building smart robots, text understanding, computer vision, medical informatics

resources.title: Deep Learning
resources.description: Deep learning is a form of machine learning that enables computers to learn from experience and understand the world in terms of a hierarchy of concepts.
learningObjectives: Mathematical foundations of deep learning
Modern practical deep learning techniques
Deep learning research
Sequence modeling with recurrent and recursive nets

sections.title: Part I: Applied Math and Machine Learning Basics
Part II: Modern Practical Deep Networks

resources.title: Python for Beginners: Learn Python with Hands-on Projects
resources.description: A beginner-oriented Python course covering core programming concepts, Python libraries, web development, data processing, automation, and practical tools through hands-on projects and real-world applications. It integrates development tools and frameworks used in professional Python development workflows.
learningObjectives: Python core programming fundamentals
Data structures: lists, tuples, dicts, sets
Exception handling and unit testing
File I/O and JSON data processing
Object-oriented programming with Python
Web scraping with BeautifulSoup and Scrapy
Web application development with Flask
REST API development with Flask and SQLAlchemy
Database integration with PostgreSQL and MongoDB
CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions
targetAudience: Professionals seeking practical Python application skills

resources.title: Python Programming Bootcamp
resources.description: A comprehensive Python bootcamp teaching core Python syntax, problem-solving, GUI, database, and web development skills, along with applied data science and machine learning concepts.
learningObjectives: Develop a deep understanding of Python 3 language fundamentals
Solve real programming problems using Python in practical applications

sections.title: Data Science Tools
topics: Install Anaconda, Jupyter & Data Science Packages

targetAudience: Developers seeking to strengthen Python for real-world problem solving

resources.title: 90 Days of Python : From Zero to becoming a Pro Developer
resources.description: A comprehensive Python course designed to take learners from absolute beginner to professional developer, covering programming fundamentals, GUI applications, data analysis, and real-world projects with interview preparation.
learningObjectives: Learn Python from absolute zero to professional proficiency.
Build real-time professional GUI applications and complete real-world projects.
Prepare for Python job interviews with curated questions and solutions.
Understand Python concepts through over 25 assignments and practical examples.
